states this Pokémon towed

It is said to have made Pokémon

There is an enduring legend that states this
Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

All over the world, there are legends that tell
of Regigigas creating other Pokémon in its
own image.

It’s said that Regigigas created other Pokémon
from many different materials before it moved
the continents to where they are today.

According to legend, Regigigas pulled landmasses together and
bound them with rope to create the continent of Hisui. Though I
have my doubts, the story could well contain a shred of truth.
name: Regigigas
